parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - masculine singular construct
Conjunctive waw | Verb - Piel - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular | third person masculine plural
str2: To fasten upon, to seize, be strong, obstinate, to bind, restrain, conquer
To be or become much, many or great
Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Benjamin -- 'son of the right hand', youngest son of Jacob, also the name of two other Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To fall out, come to pass, become, be
